The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 December is 2,139,956 (3,801.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 26 December, there were 225,790 new confirmed cases (401.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 December, there were 189,798 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 19% (35,992 extra cases).
